column1: #text=It was a sunny afternoon so my friend and I went decided to go for a ride on our bicycles in the woods .
#text=I did n't check the air pressure beforehand and thought it would be okay .
#text=As we were riding through the trails in the woods the terrain was more rough than I had expected and the the tire went flat .
#text=I got off my bicycle and knelt down to check the condition of the tire to see if there were any punctures .
#text=There were n't any and it was just out of air .
#text=It was a good thing my friend packed an air pump .
#text=I stuck the needle from the air pump into the tire and started to pump air .
#text=The bicycle tire started to inflate and it was good as new .
#text=I packed the air pump and handed it back to my friend and continued our bicycle adventure in the woods .
